name: Movie and TV Series Organizer
tagline: Tool for retrieving organizing movies/TV Series based data from IMDB
body:
### Welcome to Movie and TV Series Organizer.
This tool helps you organize your movies and TV series based on data fetched from IMDB. Various uses of the tool include:
1. Fetch information about a particular movie.
2. Organize your media library based on year/genre/director.
3. Clean up any unwanted files in the directory.

### Usage:
First set up an alias for the command:
```
$ alias imdbtool="python /path/to/imdbplugin.py"
```

### Some interesting usage examples:

Show all info about file X-Men.First.Class
```
$ imdbtool -t /path/to/X-Men.First.Class.2011.720p.BrRip.264.YIFY.mp4
```   
Show all info about 1924 version of 'Sherlock'
```
$ imdbtool -t /path/to/Sherlock.1924.avi
```    
Show best guess for a misspelled name
```
$ imdbtool -t "Ture git"
```    
Print movie's rating
```
$ imdbtool -t Cars | sed -n '/^imdbrating/{n;p;}'
```    
Download movie's poster
```
$  imdbtool -t Cars | wget `sed -n '/^poster/{n;p;}'`
```
    
### Additional useful features:

Coming soon.....
Bugs and feature requests accepted.

### Release Details
Currently the tool is in alpha version. It is being re-worked before being released to public. To view the source code check-out the project from the `plugin` branch. A release version will be rolled out once all the pending issues are resolved.

### Authors and Contributors
Snehashish Pal (@mukcute).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the tool? Contact mukcute.cooltopper@gmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
